text: The National People's Congress Agriculture and Rural Affairs Committee () is one of nine special committees of the National People's Congress, the national legislature of the People's Republic of China. The special committee was created during the first session of the 9th National People's Congress in March 1998, and has existed for every National People's Congress since. ==Membership== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Congress !! Chairperson !! Vice- Chairs !! Members |- | 9th National People's Congress || Gao Dezhan (高德占) || || |- | 10th National People's Congress || Liu Mingzu (刘明祖) || || |- | 11th National People's Congress || Wang Yunlong (王云龙) || || |- | 12th National People's Congress || Chen Jianguo (陈建国) || || |} ==References== Category:Special committees of the National People's Congress
title: National People's Congress Agriculture and Rural Affairs Committee
